name: Super Mix-a Mania
description:
Welcome to SUPER MIX-A MANIA!
A colourful game that will allow you to mix the basics(RED, BLUE and YELLOW) to match the columns as they are approaching our hero.

Impossibly difficult, 3 button game. Good luck out there!

Thank you in advance, any feedback or donations are both greatly appreciated!

WEB BASED CONTROLS

A - RED

S - BLUE

D - YELLOW

ESC[X] - back to main menu

M[Mute button] - mute sound
